speaker.whotheyare: Since 2015, computer programs Max Hawkins wrote have been giving him randomly generated instructions on how to live his life.
speaker.whylisten: Max Hawkins's "bubble hopping" program for attending randomly selected Facebook events was featured in NPR's Invisibilia podcast. He is the co-creator of Dialup, a serendipitous voice-chat app that has been mentioned in The New Yorker, The Guardian and the New York Times's Modern Love column.
